description: Alitinity Clickhouse Operator metrics exported by Monitoring Agent

panels.description: Check Zookeeper connection, Disk Free space and network interconnection between replicas ASAP
panels.title: ReadOnly replicas

panels.description: For example, version 11.22.33 is translated to 11022033
panels.title: Version

panels.description: Show different types of connections for each server
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Show readonly and partial shutdown replicas, zookeeer exceptions, zookeeer sessions, zookeeper init requests
panels.title: Replication and ZooKeeper Exceptions

panels.description: Show DNS errors and distributed server-server connections failures
panels.title: DNS and Distributed Connection Errors

panels.description: Number of queries started to be interpreted and maybe executed. Does not include queries that are failed to parse, that are rejected due to AST size limits; rejected due to quota limits or limits on number of simultaneously running queries. May include internal queries initiated by ClickHouse itself. Does not count subqueries.
panels.title: Queries

panels.description: Show how much bytes read and decompress via compressed buffer on each server in cluster
panels.title: Compressed Read Buffer

panels.description:
Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated in currently executing queries. 

Note that some memory allocations may not be accounted.
panels.title: Memory for Queries

panels.description: ## Tracks amount of inserted data.
panels.title: Insert Requests

panels.description: ## Tracks rows of inserted data.
panels.title: Rows Inserted

panels.description: ## Tracks amount of inserted data.
panels.title: Bytes Inserted

panels.description:
BackgroundPoolTask	
---
Number of active tasks in BackgroundProcessingPool (merges, mutations, fetches, or replication queue bookkeeping)


BackgroundMovePoolTask
---
Number of active tasks in BackgroundProcessingPool for moves


BackgroundSchedulePoolTask	
---
A number of active tasks in BackgroundSchedulePool. This pool is used for periodic ReplicatedMergeTree tasks, like cleaning old data parts, altering data parts, replica re-initialization, etc.
panels.title: Background Tasks

panels.description: Show how intensive background merge processes
panels.title: Merges

panels.description:
## MemoryTrackingInBackgroundProcessingPool	

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated in background processing pool (that is dedicated for backround merges, mutations and fetches). 


## MemoryTrackingInBackgroundMoveProcessingPool

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated in background processing pool (that is dedicated for backround moves). 


## MemoryTrackingInBackgroundSchedulePool

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated in background schedule pool (that is dedicated for bookkeeping tasks of Replicated tables).


## MemoryTrackingForMerges

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated for background merges. Included in MemoryTrackingInBackgroundProcessingPool. 


Note that this values may include a drift when the memory was allocated in a context of background processing pool and freed in other context or vice-versa. This happens naturally due to caches for tables indexes and doesn't indicate memory leaks.
panels.title: Replication Queue

panels.description: Show how intensive background merge processes
panels.title: Merged Rows

panels.description: Number of mutations (ALTER DELETE/ALTER UPDATE)
panels.title: Mutations

panels.description: Number of requests to ZooKeeper in fly.
panels.title: Zookeeper Requests

panels.description:
Read
Number of read (read, pread, io_getevents, etc.) syscalls in fly

Write
Number of write (write, pwrite, io_getevents, etc.) syscalls in fly
panels.title: Read/Write syscalls

panels.description: Show which percent of mark files (.mrk) read from memory instead of disk
panels.title: Marks Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Show how intensive data exchange between replicas in parts
panels.title: Replication Jobs

panels.description: Number of Replicated tables that are leaders. Leader replica is responsible for assigning merges, cleaning old blocks for deduplications and a few more bookkeeping tasks. There may be no more than one leader across all replicas at one moment of time. If there is no leader it will be elected soon or it indicate an issue.
panels.title: Replicated tables leaders

panels.description:
## MemoryTrackingInBackgroundProcessingPool	

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated in background processing pool (that is dedicated for backround merges, mutations and fetches). 


## MemoryTrackingInBackgroundMoveProcessingPool

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated in background processing pool (that is dedicated for backround moves). 


## MemoryTrackingInBackgroundSchedulePool

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated in background schedule pool (that is dedicated for bookkeeping tasks of Replicated tables).


## MemoryTrackingForMerges

Total amount of memory (bytes) allocated for background merges. Included in MemoryTrackingInBackgroundProcessingPool. 


Note that this values may include a drift when the memory was allocated in a context of background processing pool and freed in other context or vice-versa. This happens naturally due to caches for tables indexes and doesn't indicate memory leaks.
panels.title: Background Pools Memory
